MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH4 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Beeston View, Allington Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.41PM. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on their way to the local substation to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 9.45pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.45PM on 18th March 2021
